Key Match Events: Oneil Cruz struggled defensively in center field, missing a dive on a line drive by Adam Frazier and having trouble tracking a fly ball by Bobby Witt Jr., both resulting in runs.
The Pittsburgh Pirates lost to the Kansas City Royals at PNC Park, 5-1.
Pre-Game Insights: Oneil Cruz expressed confidence in his transition to center field, stating he feels comfortable and does not intend to return to shortstop.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Derek Shelton acknowledged the defensive challenges Cruz faced and emphasized the learning process involved in transitioning to a new position.
Cruz admitted to liking the fan interaction more in center field and maintained a positive attitude about the position change.
